en.description: Vazarin Transmutate Core is a special Core that can be used as an ingredient in Transmutation. When transmuted alongside other Mods, the core ensures that the resulting Mod will be of Vazarin Polarity. Using a Transmutation Core also removes the credit cost for that transmutation, allowing for cheaper attempts at transmuting Rare-quality Mods. Transmutation Cores do not guarantee the rarity of the resulting mod, only their polarity.

ru.description: Ядро трансмутации Вазарин — мод, использующийся в преобразовании и позволяющий без денежных затрат гарантированно получить мод с полярностью .
